title: New: YOOFS – HAZY DAYZ
content:
This new gem from Bournemouth’s YOOFS is quite unlike anything else coming from the UK at the moment.

If truth be told, it would probably fit in better amongst some of the scuzz-pop acts crawling out of the Brooklyn woodwork. That’s not a criticism of the track by any means, as it’s a wonderful four minutes of shimmering indie pop, drawing from shoegaze inspirations on the guitars alongside the ballad-esque vocal delivery, making for a thoroughly engaging listen. Check HAZY DAYZ out below.

HAZY DAYZ is out now via The Sounds Of Sweet Nothing
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
